description: AR-01 is the primary Regional Transport Office for Itanagar, the capital city of Arunachal Pradesh. It manages all transport-related services including vehicle registration, driving licenses, and permit issuance for the capital region. The office serves as a critical hub for the state's administrative and transport infrastructure.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Capital Complex, Itanagar (Naharlagun), Papum Pare District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-02 is the District Transport Office (DTO) located in Yupia, serving the Papum Pare district of Arunachal Pradesh. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permit issuance for regions outside the Itanagar Capital Region.
address: District Transport Office, Yupia, Papum Pare District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-03 is the Regional Transport Office serving the Tawang district in Arunachal Pradesh. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving licenses, and permit issuance for the high-altitude border region. The office plays a crucial role in managing transport activities in this strategically significant Himalayan district.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Tawang, Arunachal Pradesh

description: The AR-04 RTO is the District Transport Office (DTO) located in Bomdila, serving the West Kameng district. It oversees vehicle registration, driving permit issuance, and the implementation of the Motor Vehicles Act in this strategically important mountainous region.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Bomdila, West Kameng District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-05 is the District Transport Office serving Seppa and the East Kameng district in Arunachal Pradesh. It is responsible for motor vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the enforcement of the Motor Vehicles Act within this mountainous region.
address: District Transport Office (DTO), Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Seppa, East Kameng District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: The AR-06 RTO is the District Transport Office serving Ziro and the surrounding Lower Subansiri district. It is responsible for motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and tax collection within the Ziro plateau region, which is famous for its cultural heritage and scenic landscapes.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, Deputy Commissioner's Office Complex, Ziro, Lower Subansiri District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-07 is the official District Transport Office (DTO) for Daporijo, serving the Upper Subansiri district of Arunachal Pradesh. The office handles all vehicular administrative tasks including registration, licensing, and taxation for the central-western region of the state.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, Deputy Commissioner Complex, Daporijo, Upper Subansiri District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: The AR-08 RTO serves the town of Along (also known as Aalo), the administrative headquarters of the West Siang district in Arunachal Pradesh. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport permits for the mountainous region of the state.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Along, West Siang District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: The AR-09 Regional Transport Office (RTO) serves the city of Pasighat and the surrounding East Siang district in Arunachal Pradesh. It is a key administrative hub for vehicle registration, driving licensing, and transport permit issuance in the state's oldest town.
address: District Transport Office (DTO), Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Pasighat, East Siang District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-10 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Anini, the headquarters of the Dibang Valley district in Arunachal Pradesh. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport law enforcement for one of the most remote and sparsely populated regions in India.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Anini, Dibang Valley District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-11 is the Regional Transport Office for the Lohit district in Arunachal Pradesh, headquartered in Tezu. The office is responsible for vehicle registration, driver licensing, and enforcement of road safety regulations in the eastern part of the state.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Tezu, Lohit District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-12 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Changlang district in Arunachal Pradesh. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport permit services for the eastern part of the state.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, O/o Deputy Commissioner, Changlang, Arunachal Pradesh

description: The AR-13 RTO serves as the District Transport Office (DTO) for the Tirap district in Arunachal Pradesh, with its headquarters in Khonsa. It is responsible for the administration of vehicle registrations, driving license issuance, and transport tax collection in the eastern part of the state. The office plays a vital role in regulating transport services across the district's mountainous terrain.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Khonsa, Tirap District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: The AR-14 RTO serves the Yingkiong region, which is the administrative headquarters of the Upper Siang district in Arunachal Pradesh. As a District Transport Office (DTO), it is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and local transport governance in this mountainous region near the Siang River.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Yingkiong, Upper Siang District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-15 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for the Kurung Kumey district in Arunachal Pradesh, headquartered in Koloriang. The office is responsible for vehicle registration, driving licenses, and road safety enforcement in this mountainous region near the Indo-China border.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Koloriang, Kurung Kumey District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-16 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Roing, which serves as the administrative center for the Lower Dibang Valley district in Arunachal Pradesh. This office is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and enforcement of motor vehicle laws in the region.
address: District Transport Office, O/o Deputy Commissioner, Roing, Lower Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-17 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for the Anjaw district in Arunachal Pradesh, based in Hawai. It serves the easternmost part of India, managing vehicle registration, driving licenses, and road safety regulations for the region.
address: District Transport Office, O/o The Deputy Commissioner, Hawai, Anjaw District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-18 is the official RTO code for the Longding district in Arunachal Pradesh. This office was established following the district's creation in 2012 and handles all vehicle-related registration and licensing services for the region bordering Myanmar.
address: District Transport Office, Longding District Headquarters, Longding, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-19 is the Regional Transport Office for Palin, serving the Kra Daadi district in Arunachal Pradesh. It was established after the district's bifurcation from Kurung Kumey in 2015 and handles all statutory transport functions including vehicle registration and licensing via the Vahan and Sarathi portals.
address: District Transport Office, Palin, Kra Daadi District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: The AR-20 RTO serves the Namsai district in Arunachal Pradesh, handling vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and transport permit management. It was established following the creation of the Namsai district to provide localized transport administration for the region.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, Namsai, Arunachal Pradesh

description: The AR-21 RTO office serves the Siang district of Arunachal Pradesh, which was officially inaugurated in 2015. Headquartered in Boleng, this office manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport permits for the newly formed administrative region.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, Boleng, Siang District, Arunachal Pradesh

description: AR-22 is the Regional Transport Office serving the Lower Siang district of Arunachal Pradesh, headquartered in Likabali. It was established following the district's creation in late 2018 to manage vehicle registration and transport administration for the local population.
address: District Transport Office, Likabali, Lower Siang District, Arunachal Pradesh
